meanings.definition: A place suitable for hiding in
meanings.sent1: The children found a small hideaway in the bushes to play hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent2: The old house had a secret hideaway in the attic where treasures were hidden.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the empty box was the perfect hideaway to nap in.
meanings.sent4: The cave by the beach served as a natural hideaway for the pirates.
meanings.sent5: The dense forest was a mysterious hideaway for all sorts of creatures.

meanings.definition: A secluded place for relaxation or privacy
meanings.sent1: The cozy cabin in the woods was the perfect hideaway for a weekend getaway.
meanings.sent2: The garden gazebo became her favorite hideaway to read and unwind.
meanings.sent3: The hammock under the shady tree was a peaceful hideaway from the summer heat.
meanings.sent4: The small island in the lake was a hidden hideaway for those seeking solitude.
meanings.sent5: The mountain cabin offered a picturesque hideaway from the hustle and bustle of the city.
